title: Lawyers accused of AI misuse in FIFA case fined $24,400
description: A federal judge in Puerto Rico has sanctioned two plaintiffs’ lawyers over error-filled court filings in a lawsuit involving professional soccer, awarding more than $24,400 in legal fees to Paul Weiss, Sidley Austin and other law firms that accused the lawyers of misusing artificial intelligence in the case.
content: Sept 24 (Reuters) - A federal judge in Puerto Rico has sanctioned two plaintiffs’ lawyers over error-filled court filings in a lawsuit involving professional soccer, awarding more than $24,400 in legal fees to Paul Weiss, Sidley Austin and other law ... [1707 chars]

title: Montreal advertising firm Sid Lee embracing AI for campaign ideas

content:

title: At Jagat Mukherjee Park, Maa fights for human values in a futuristic AI-dominated world
description: The 89th year of the north Kolkata puja brings alive a future where artificial intelligence rules but Durga slays the dark side
content: Jagat Mukherjee Park’s 2025 Durga Puja pandal theme merges technology with tradition. Titled ‘Artificial Intelligence: Boon or Bane’, the pandal recreates a futuristic world imagined 50 years ahead, where humans and robots coexist uneasily and the Go... [1156 chars]

title: Today's US stocks market climb: Nasdaq, Dow, S&P 500 rise on Alibaba’s $50B AI investment, investors watch Fed reports and global market moves
description: US stocks went up as Alibaba planned more spending on artificial intelligence, helping tech stocks recover. Investors are watching the Federal Reserve for possible interest rate cuts and key reports like inflation and home sales. Chinese tech stocks and Lithium Americas also rose. Global markets reacted to Trumps comments on the Russia-Ukraine war, boosting European defense shares.
